alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Montgomery; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 6:35PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN...EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY AND NORTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 635 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jonesburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warrenton, Jonesburg, Hawk Point and Truxton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 183 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
